long_description: The Manduka eQua Yoga Mat Towel excels as a germ-resistant gym towel, a meditation shawl during cool sitting sessions or as a space-saving, highly absorbent travel or hiking towel. This multipurpose towel is extremely light, yet plush, durable, super-absorbent and quick-drying. Tightly woven fibers create a soft, suede-like feel. Split microfiber fabric optimizes moisture absorption and evaporation; it becomes slip-resistant when damp. The Manduka eQua Yoga Mat Towel withstands countless washings.
short_description: The Manduka eQua Yoga Mat Towel excels as a germ-resistant gym towel, a meditation shawl during cool sitting sessions or as a space-saving, highly absorbent travel or hiking towel.
